data.name: Castle Greyrot Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Original Castle Greyrot soundtrack by composer Bewitched as Dark aka BAD. This DLC contains all MP3 tracks from Castle Greyrot and will be updated as the new soundtracks are added.

BAD Bio: One woman band/project. Discography : No Hope No Fear (2014) // V​.​I​.​T​.​R​.​I​.​O​.​L (2014)// Loading​.​.​.​.​.(2014) // B​.​A​.​D (2015)// NOISE (2015)// Electronic B​(​lo​)​ody Music (2015)// The Night of The Purple Moon (2015)// MIST (2016)// SPADYUM (2016)// LADY POISON (2016)// LOVE ME TODAY HATE ME TOMORROW (2017)// A TRIBUTE TO HEKATE (2018)// PLEASE​.​. DON'T BREED! (2019)// LONE WOLF CLUB (2020)// DEAD RESONANCE (2020)// BAD WIZARD (2021)// MEGANTEREON (2022)

data.short_description: Castle Greyrot is a challenging rogue-lite turn-based RPG that revolves around killing brutal bosses, a lot. Train your party members to overcome the horrors of Castle Greyrot and its unending curse.
